title: Phyllanthus reticulata
Vernacular name: English- </br> Hindi- Bhuinowla </br> Gujarati- Kamboi </br> Sanskrit- Krishna-Kaamboji </br>
Chemical Constituents: tannic acid, terpenoids, flavonoids, phenolic compounds and steroids
Therapeutic uses: used as astringent, diuretic, antidiabetic, antiviral, anticancer, antiplasmodial, hepatoprotective, antibacterial and anti-inflammatory activities
